item.title: [Delta] Talking to NPC's [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @john5689 john5689
item.description:
@john5689 wrote:

Ok im guna give this as much detail as i can possibly can. Im at the moment making a quest and to start it I need to speak to the Lummy duke. When i talk to him yes he goes into the first bit but when i click on click here to continue it closes the chat. Here are the codes:

if(NPCID == 741){ if(q12 == 0){ NpcDialogue = 124; NpcDialogueSend = false; } }

case 124: if(playerLevel[0] < 60); { talk("Sorry I need a more Stronger warrior!", 741); if(playerLevel[0] > 59); { talk("Help me i need a warrior to help me!", 741); break; } } case 125: talk("Basicly there are Abyssal deamons underneath my castle! Now i don't know how", 741); break; case 126: talk("Talk to cook and he will explain more", 741); sendQuest("@yel@Lost Abyss", 7337); q12 = 1; break;
If you want me to make a youtube video I can make one for you.

Read full topic
